verses.roman:
jyaiṣṭha-māse prabhu yameśvara-ṭoṭā āilā
bhakta-anurodhe tāhāṅ bhikṣā ye karilā

synonyms: jyaiṣṭha-māse—during the month of May-June; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yameśvara-ṭoṭā—to the garden of Lord Śiva, Yameśvara; āilā—came; bhakta-anurodhe—on the request of the devotees; tāhāṅ—there; bhikṣā ye karilā—accepted prasāda.
translation: In that month of May-June, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu came to the garden of Yameśvara [Lord Śiva] and accepted prasāda there at the request of the devotees.
